title: Charlotte Independence Soccer Club
text:
Charlotte Independence Soccer Club, sometimes referred to as Charlotte Independence II, is a soccer club from <a href="Rock%20Hill%2C%20South%20Carolina">Rock Hill, South Carolina</a> that competes in the Deep South Division of <a href="USL%20League%20Two">USL League Two</a>. They are the affiliate of <a href="USL%20Championship">USL Championship</a> club <a href="Charlotte%20Independence">Charlotte Independence</a>. Despite the similar name and using the same logo, they are a separately owned and operated club from the professional team, instead merely affiliated with them.
The club was formed following the merger of <a href="Discoveries%20SC">Discoveries SC</a>, Carolina Rapids, and Lake Norman SC to form the Charlotte Independence Soccer Club which will serve as the affiliate club for the <a href="Charlotte%20Independence">Charlotte Independence</a> of the <a href="USL%20Championship">USL Championship</a>. They will take the league spot that Discoveries previously occupied. They were set to begin play in the <a href="2020%20USL%20League%20Two%20season">2020 USL League Two season</a>, however, the season was cancelled due to the <a href="COVID-19%20pandemic">COVID-19 pandemic</a>.
